definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

Advanced Subjects Test, university entrance exam that assesses candidates’ higher level knowledge of specific subjects and their readiness to study in their selected academic discipline (Tw)/abbr. to 指考[Zhi3 kao3]
pinyin: Da4 xue2 Ru4 xue2 Zhi3 ding4 Ke1 mu4 Kao3 shi4
containing_words.word: 大學入學指定科目考試

sentences.english: The course includes the origin and development of gerontology.
sentences.chinese: 本科目介紹老人學的起源與發展。

sentences.english: Some of them skip classes just because they have no interest in certain subjects.
sentences.chinese: 有的跳班僅僅是因爲他們沒有在某些科目的興趣。

sentences.english: Your major and minor don't matter.
sentences.chinese: 你的主修科目和輔修科目不重要。

sentences.english: Your major and minor don't matter.
sentences.chinese: 你的主修科目和輔修科目不重要。

sentences.english: This subject surveys the main currents of European cultural and intellectual history in the modern period.
sentences.chinese: 本科目概括當代歐洲文化與知識份子歷史的主要思潮。

sentences.english: Unifying all accounting subjects of science and technology expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 二是儘量統一各類科技計劃的經費預決算科目。

sentences.english: What subject do you like? I like P. E. lessons.
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡哪門科目？我喜歡體育課。

sentences.english: Mingfa is one of the subjects of imperial examinations in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明法是唐代科舉考試的科目之一。

sentences.english: So let's say that you are given a choice of subjects.
sentences.chinese: 比如你有幾項科目能夠選擇。

sentences.english: You will be in the danger of failing the course if you exceed four absences.
sentences.chinese: 如果你缺席超過四次，這個科目你將有被當掉的危險。

sentences.english: I filled in the form and wrote down typing as my training course.
sentences.chinese: 我填寫了報名表，並寫下了打字作爲我的培訓科目。

sentences.english: All four subjects go back to the tradition of Pythagoras .
sentences.chinese: 所有四門科目可追溯到畢達哥拉斯時代的傳統。

sentences.english: A key component of MITE is the practicum.
sentences.chinese: MITE的一個關鍵成份是實習科目。

sentences.english: Kudrow graduated from exclusive American college Vassar , where she gained a major in biology.
sentences.chinese: 庫卓畢業於貴族大學瓦瑟學院，主修科目是生物學。

sentences.english: My group's favourite subject is P. E.
sentences.chinese: 我們組最喜歡的科目是體育。

sentences.english: We are mixed with cash when making account book deal with salary of 2 course.
sentences.chinese: 我們在做帳時就用現金和應付工資2個科目的。

definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to add material to an exam/supplementary exam
exam candidate/student whose name has been put forward for an exam
literature and language/(PRC) Chinese (as a school subject)
